bullets: • Bill McKibben, the founder of 350.org, flew in to speak at the rally in New Jersey
• Bill would charge fossil fuel companies a fee for the historic harms their pollution has caused New Jersey residents
• The bill has drawn strong opposition from the fossil fuel industry, but New Jerseyans are mounting efforts to bring it to a vote

• Republicans pushed for the new map after being pressured by Trump to add more GOP seats to preserve the party’s House majority

items.title: Quantum computers just simulated physics too complex for supercomputers
bullets: • Researchers created scalable quantum circuits capable of simulating nuclear physics on more than 100 qubits
• These circuits efficiently prepare complex initial states that classical computers cannot handle
• The achievement demonstrates a new path toward simulating particle collisions and extreme forms of matter
• It may ultimately illuminate long-standing cosmic mysteries

items.title: Trump’s anti-climate agenda could result in 1.3m more deaths globally, analysis finds
bullets: • New research shows the vast majority of deaths will occur outside the US
• Most of the people expected to die from soaring temperatures live in poor, hot countries in Africa and south Asia
• The actual number of people who die from heat will be much higher, but a warming planet will also result in fewer deaths from cold

items.title: A 2,000-year mystery in chameleon eyes is finally solved
bullets: • A 2,000-year mystery in chameleon eyes is finally solved with modern CT imaging
• Hidden behind each protruding eye are two long, spiraled optic nerves -- a configuration not documented in any other lizard species
• The coils give the eyes extra slack, enabling 360-degree scanning without neck mobility

items.title: Why some ant colonies get tricked into killing their own queens
bullets: • Some female ants practice a kind of chemical warfare that lets them sneak into the established colonies of other ant species and manipulate the worker ants into committing regicide
• The queen is paramount in an ant colony; the queen produces all the eggs, while the workers take care of her
• After a colony has been around awhile, however, it will start to produce some females capable of reproduction
• These females fly away, in order to establish new colonies and their own reigns
